sentences.en: After enduring the hardship of the arduous fieldwork , the prospecting team discovered many new ores.
sentences.cn: 地质勘探队员餐风饮露,历尽辛苦, 找到了不少新的矿藏.

sentences.en: an economic policy that caused great hardship for many people
sentences.cn: 造成许多人贫困的经济政策

sentences.en: Childhood hardship matured in him a precocious sense of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 儿时的磨难使他提早形成了一种责任感.

sentences.en: Courage is nothing less than indifference to hardship and pain.
sentences.cn: 勇气就是对艰难和痛苦的蔑视.

sentences.en: Dauntless in spirit, they became steeled through hardship.
sentences.cn: 他们不屈不挠, 在艰苦的生活中锻炼得更加坚强了.

sentences.en: Despite the hardship, Ustinov was thrilled by my visit.
sentences.cn: 尽管生活艰苦, 乌斯季诺夫还是对我的来访感到激动.

sentences.en: Hardship and penury wore him out before his time.
sentences.cn: 受穷受苦使他未老先衰.

sentences.en: Hardship disposes man to meet adversity.
sentences.cn: 艰苦的生活使人能应付逆境.

sentences.en: He didn't seem to mind any kind of hardship.
sentences.cn: 他好象对什么苦都不在乎.

sentences.en: He was willing to face any hardship in fulfillment of his duty.
sentences.cn: 他愿意面对任何困难去履行他的职责.

sentences.en: If other people can endure hardship , why can't I?
sentences.cn: 人家能吃苦, 我就不能?

sentences.en: Many people are suffering economic hardship.
sentences.cn: 很多人正处于经济困难之中。

sentences.en: Many poor households are experiencing real hardship.
sentences.cn: 很多贫穷家庭正经历严重的困难。

sentences.en: Many students are suffering severe financial hardship.
sentences.cn: 许多学生经济非常困难。

sentences.en: The tax increases will, in the aggregate, cause much hardship.
sentences.cn: 增加税收归结起来造成很多困难.

sentences.en: Their love of life comes in spite of, almost in defiance of, considerable hardship.
sentences.cn: 尽管面临众多的艰难困苦，他们还是几乎义无反顾地表现出了对生活的热爱。

sentences.en: They've been promised their full July salary minus the hardship payment.
sentences.cn: 他们已经得到承诺，7月份的工资除去辛劳补助外将全额发放。

trans.tran_en: something that makes your life difficult or unpleasant, especially a lack of money, or the condition of having a difficult life
